remarks: Variation of orthomodular law.  Definition of OML law in [Kalmbach] p. 22.  ( ~ pjoml2i analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 6-Nov-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
omllaw.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
omllaw.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
omllaw.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
omllaw.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
omllaw.o $e |- ._|_ = ( oc ` K ) $.
omllaw2N $p |- ( ( K e. OML /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .<_ Y -> ( X .\/ ( ( ._|_ ` X ) ./\ Y ) ) = Y ) ) $.
